entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
